resources.string: " Grocery list + Butter - Bread + Chocolate + Apples - Bananas "

" Recipe instructions In a small pot over medium-low heat, melt the butter until it is golden and smells nutty.Strain through a sieve set over a bowl (see note). Let cool for 30 minutes. With the rack in the middle position, preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Line two baking sheets with silicone mats or parchment paper. Meanwhile, in a bowl, combine the flour, baking soda and salt. "
" Random quote Perfection is achieved, not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away. "
" Bucket list + Buy bucket + Buy water - Pour water - Drink bucket "

" _ Not having heard something is not as good as having heard it; having heard it is not as good as having seen it; having seen it is not as good as knowing it; knowing it is not as good as putting it into practice. "
" Languages to learn + English - French + Spanish - Mandarin - Arabic "
